show_name: Shuumatsu Nani Shitemasu ka? Isogashii Desu ka? Sukutte Moratte Ii Desu ka?
other_title: What are you doing at the end? Are you busy? Can you save me?
WorldEnd: What do you do at the end of the world? Are you busy? Will you save us?
終末なにしてますか？忙しいですか？救ってもらっていいですか？
ending_theme: #3: "Ever be my love" by Tamaru Yamada (ep 12)
